description: I've been using this app for hours now on Ubuntu, BotW runs like butter on my machine, way better than playing it on the Switch. Haven't had a single crash or funny behaviour. 5 out of 5 stars.

after I figure it out how to play the games with the txt keys, you can look for them, i installed the elf one. I have to say, great job, now I can finally play the games I couldnt get on my Wii u. awesome guys, its fun to play them on the steam deck, feels good
I am using this emulator on Endeavouros and I get slightly higher frames on Linux for BOTW compared to windows 11 on the same hardware.

The developers have made it clear that this is an experimental release and WIP, but the fact that things are as stable as they are as it stands is impressive. This is a great alternative to building the software
summary: Runs well! Lot of great progress

description: Thank you Cemu developers for finally bringing this to Flathub! Works very well for a experimental app.

I've been using this emulator since right before the vulkan backend release, and it has been solid across the board. I have frequently been using it for Breath of the Wild (and Mario kart 8 online until Nintendo closed that RIP). I have used the AUR and appimage releases and it's great to see this finally release on flathub where I get updates. It's not perfect, but it's close enough that I can safely say it's a great emulator.
I cannot get it to run my games.

Launches application setup window just fine, but once settings are configured and you hit either top right x, or the close dialog button it freezes and refuses to launch again until reinstalled. Repeat ad nauseum.

Bardzo dobry emulator wszystko dziala working 100%hhh gggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggggg

After setting up the emulator it freezes and doesn't work at all. Not launching. Needs fix ASAP
It runs perfectly, but when i try to use the steam deck gamepad or a controller then when i say to use them it goes back to keyboard right when you exit the input menu.

been trying to get tekken tag 2 running on the steam deck the past few updates but keep running into the same issues. As far as performance, it runs very well, but there significant texture issues. the emulator will only launch once for some reason. Once launched a second time or any time after that, it will softlock attempting to start the game, and it will continue to do this until the emulator in uninstalled and reinstalled.
flatpack version gets stuck after first config
Don`t waste your time. It sucks.
Runs once, crashes, doesn't launch again.
plays about as good as the proton windows version. does not automaticly find your steamdeck controller and audio but they are there in the dropdown boxes
Can't get it to launch. Tried flatpak, compiling, etc. Would not launch.
summary: Worked great, than stopped launching at al

description: I got it to stop freezing after the config screen by playing around with its permissions in flatseal (turned virtualization + some other stuff on)
Good Emulator Good Emulator Good Emulator Good Emulator Good Emulator Good Emulator Good Emulator Good Emulator
Report issues to their GitHub people!
good emulator for most games but some games especially botw just cant run and just crash while trying to load
works perfectly and faster than the win ver.
summary: works perfectly and faster than the win ver

description:
Flatpak CEMU works perfectly fine out of the box, I just had setup my 8BitDo Controller.
Played BotW and Smash, no problems at all.

Works great and has motion control support.
Make sure to install steam devices or configure permissions manually for Cemu to enable gyro control.
Tiene un problema con los joyticks genericos que la version de windows no tiene que afecta a no tomar bien los botones y el stick derecho no funciona como corresponde.
